description: Comprehensive code review and refactoring plan for OpenShift Control Plane Replacement Tool
reasoning: Conducted detailed analysis of modular codebase supporting 4 use cases (worker addition, control plane replacement, worker-to-control conversion, control plane expansion). Identified critical architectural issues including dependency injection anti-patterns, code redundancy, and improper function placement. Created 8-phase refactoring plan with priority matrix and risk assessment to improve maintainability while preserving functionality.
